titleStmt.title: The ninth tragedie of Lucius Anneus Seneca called Octauia. Translated out of Latine into English, by T.N. student in Cambridge
Octavia (Praetexta). English.
titleStmt.author: T. N. (Thomas Nuce), d. 1617.
Seneca, Lucius Annaeus, ca. 4 B.C.-65 A.D., attributed name.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
